Description_lang: Reduces the threat from your Backstab, Sinister Strike, Hemorrhage, and Eviscerate abilities.

description_blz.en_US: Reduces the threat from your Backstab, Sinister Strike, Hemorrhage, and Eviscerate abilities.
description_blz.es_MX: Reduce la amenaza de tus facultades Puñalada, Golpe siniestro, Hemorragia y Eviscerar.
description_blz.pt_BR: Reduz a ameaça gerada pelas suas habilidades Punhalada pelas Costas, Golpe Sinistro, Hemorragia e Eviscerar.
description_blz.de_DE: Verringert die von Euren Fähigkeiten 'Meucheln', 'Finsterer Stoß', 'Blutsturz' und 'Ausweiden' verursachte Bedrohung.
description_blz.en_GB: Reduces the threat from your Backstab, Sinister Strike, Hemorrhage, and Eviscerate abilities.
description_blz.es_ES: Reduce la amenaza de tus facultades Puñalada, Golpe siniestro, Hemorragia y Eviscerar.
description_blz.fr_FR: Réduit la menace générée par vos Attaques sournoises, Attaques pernicieuses, Hémorragies, et Eviscérations.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce la minaccia generata da Pugnalata alle Spalle, Assalto Funesto, Emorragia e Sventramento.
description_blz.ru_RU: Снижает угрозу, создаваемую способностями "Удар в спину", "Коварный удар", "Кровоизлияние" и "Потрошение".
description_blz.ko_KR: 기습, 사악한 일격, 과다출혈, 절개의 위협 수준이 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你的邪惡攻擊、背刺、出血、和剔骨所產生的威脅值降低。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你的背刺、影袭、出血和刺骨技能所产生的威胁值降低。
